participant_b.entity_text: biofilm-related genes in P. aeruginosa PAO1

verbose_text: Overhage et al. demonstrated that 4 mug/ml LL-37 was able to reduce pre-formed Pseudomonas biofilm formation in vitro, and that LL-37 treatment affected gene expression of many biofilm related genes in P. aeruginosa PAO1, including the significant downregulation of rhlA and rhlB expression.
evidence: expression of many biofilm-related genes in P. aeruginosa PAO1
